  • Method Details

    • awardPoints

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> awardPoints(String userId, PointsType pointsType, int customPoints)
      Awards points to a user based on the specified point type and custom points value.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to whom points are awarded
      pointsType - the type of points to be awarded; determines default points if no custom points are specified
      customPoints - the custom number of points to be awarded; overrides default points if greater than zero
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the operation;

    • awardPoints

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> awardPoints(String userId, PointsType pointsType)
      Awards points to a user based on the specified point type using its default point value.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user to whom points are awarded
      pointsType - the type of points to be awarded; determines the default point value
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the operation

    • getUserPoints

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserPoints> getUserPoints(String userId)
      Retrieves the UserPoints object associated with the specified user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose point record is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the UserPoints object if found or successfully created;

    • getUserPointsDTO

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserPointsDTO> getUserPointsDTO(String userId)
      Retrieves the UserPointsDTO object associated with the specified user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose point record is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the UserPointsDTO object if found or successfully created

    • getLeaderboardDTO

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserPointsDTO>> getLeaderboardDTO(int limit)
      Retrieves the top users ranked by their total points as DTOs, limited to a specified number. This method avoids circular reference issues by returning DTOs instead of full entities.
      Parameters:
      limit - the maximum number of users to include in the leaderboard; must be greater than 0
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of UserPointsDTO objects representing the users and their points

    • cleanupDuplicateUserPoints

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> cleanupDuplicateUserPoints(String userId)
      Cleans up duplicate UserPoints entries for a user
